basic_information.scholarship_name: Steve and Carol Barrymore Endowed Spanish Scholarship

description: This scholarship honors a UCO Spanish major who exhibits dedication and enthusiasm for learning, that mirror Steve and Carol's feelings in their experiences and connections with the university. Eligibility Requirements Open to undergraduate students with a Spanish or Spanish Education major (preference given to Spanish Education students) Junior or Senior level status Minimum 2.85 GPA Brief statement explaining financial need or special circumstances

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
